tasks.compile-x86_64-linux: export ENVIRONMENT=production && deno compile --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --output ./releases/debitLlama_solver-x86_64-linux -A --unstable-kv --unstable-cron main.ts
tasks.compile-aarch64-linux: export ENVIRONMENT=production && deno compile --target aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu --output ./releases/debitLlama_solver-aarch64-linux -A --unstable-kv --unstable-cron main.ts
tasks.compile-x86_64-windows: export ENVIRONMENT=production && deno compile --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --output ./releases/debitLlama_solver-x86_64-windows.exe -A --unstable-kv --unstable-cron main.ts
tasks.compile-x86_64-darwin: export ENVIRONMENT=production && deno compile --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output ./releases/debitLlama_solver-x86_64-darwin -A --unstable-kv --unstable-cron main.ts
tasks.compile-aarch64-darwin: export ENVIRONMENT=production && deno compile --target aarch64-apple-darwin --output ./releases/debitLlama_solver-aarch64-darwin -A --unstable-kv --unstable-cron main.ts
tasks.compile: deno task compile-x86_64-linux && deno task compile-aarch64-linux && deno task compile-x86_64-windows && deno task compile-x86_64-darwin && deno task compile-aarch64-darwin
